com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.lifecycle

Class AutoSpringPortalBeanFactoryPostInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.util.context.factory.AbstractBeanFactoryPostInitializer
      • com.navis.framework.util.context.factory.AutoSpringBeanFactoryPostInitializer
        • com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.lifecycle.AutoSpringPortalBeanFactoryPostInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBeanFactoryPostInitializer

    public class AutoSpringPortalBeanFactoryPostInitializer
extends AutoSpringBeanFactoryPostInitializer
    Dynamically picks up all beans registered as IBeanFactoryPostInitializer in the Portal tier ONLY. It will not pick then up if there are any Roastery instances of the bean.
